channel.title: Freezing once I attack something
channel.description:
Okay I'm new to this but..
I spawned an NPC and everytime I attack it it freezes..
Plus I don't know how to spawn items etc, help?
And my servers like empty at cities like ardy and stuff -.-[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 03:47:45 PM[/size][hr][quote="Systematic"]Okay I'm new to this but..
I spawned an NPC and everytime I attack it it freezes..
Plus I don't know how to spawn items etc, help?
And my servers like empty at cities like ardy and stuff -.-[/quote]
Please also tell me how I can save my data?:S So I can log in with the items I had

item.title: Freezing once I attack something
item.dc:creator: @moparrocksftw moparrocksftw
item.description:
@moparrocksftw wrote:

how do u spawn npcs?

item.title: Freezing once I attack something
item.dc:creator: @hypnoticpimp hypnoticpimp
item.description:
@hypnoticpimp wrote:

it freezes because the npc u spawned has 0 health u gotta goto npc.cfg to fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing once I attack something
item.dc:creator: @krome krome
item.description:
@krome wrote:

is there a server that loads of people can go on and fight in wildy and things like that, and i need to know why it freezes when i attk things to ?

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing once I attack something
item.dc:creator: @TheSorrow TheSorrow
item.description:
@TheSorrow wrote:

The towns are empty because it is your private server. No other will go on your private server unless you give them your game ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing once I attack something
item.dc:creator: @Systematic Systematic
item.description:
@Systematic wrote:

Tyvm

Ok I only need to know two more things.

1- Why does it freeze when I spawn a monster

2- Why can’t I open doors; and why are towns empty.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 04:18:46 PM[/size][hr]Also[quote=“Systematic”]Tyvm

Ok I only need to know two more things.

1- Why does it freeze when I spawn a monster

2- Why can’t I open doors; and why are towns empty.[/quote] Also wtf, now when I log in it logs me back out after 1 sec.

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing once I attack something
item.dc:creator: @Mmmk Mmmk
item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

To save your data type ::pass yourpasshere, then when you login again use the same username and the pass you typed. Thats how you used to do it anyway.

Read full topic
